sourcesContent:
const post = {
    id: "openFOI",
    title: "OpenFOI: Freedom of Information Made Easy",
    publication: "Portfolio, 2025",
    date: "2025-05-28",
    summary: "An AI-powered platform for managing Freedom of Information requests.",
    content: `
  ## Overview
  
  OpenFOI helps journalists, researchers, and citizens draft, manage, and track FOI requests using AI to speed up and improve the quality of responses.
  
  ## Features
  
  - üîç AI-assisted draft generation
  - ‚úÇÔ∏è Smart redaction with named entity detection
  - üìÑ Export to PDF and CSV formats
  - üìä Analytics dashboard to track requests over time
  - üß† GPT-powered suggested responses and flagging
  
  ## Demo
  
  Below is a demo of the OpenFOI system in action:
  
  <video controls width="100%">
    <source src="/videos/OpenFOI.mp4" type="video/mp4" />
    Your browser does not support the video tag.
  </video>
  
  ## Technologies Used
  
  - React (frontend UI)
  - FastAPI (backend API)
  - GPT-4 (language understanding & generation)
  - PostgreSQL (database)
  - Git LFS (media versioning)
  
  ## Reflections
  
  Building OpenFOI gave me deeper insight into how AI can reduce administrative friction in government workflows, and how transparency tools can scale with the right design.
  
  `
  };
  
  export default post;
